review: It is awesome, from my 7 year old to me, almost 45. Great product!  Excellent service with Amazon Prime, Hulu Plus, Netflix, Youtube.All of us love the screen sharing capabilities.I own 2 Fire Sticks, have recommended to coworkers who have also purchased this.
author: William L. Wittman, Jr.

review: It is truly wonderful, we see the shows we want when we want them.
author: Bill

review: This product worked exactly as it is described and as I needed it to. I bought it because I was not able to watch shows or movies on my Netflix account without a viewing source.(HD, but not a smart TV) I am very happy with the ability to also view other mediums such as HULU and Amazon Video services with this device. The price is reasonable and it attaches easily to my TV set. A winner in my book. Highly recommended.
author: PJ

review: I couldn't be happier with this purchase.  When I placed the order, it was backlogged for almost a month.  Fortunately, it came before the original estimated delivery date.  It was very easy to install and get on-line.  The price is more affordable than other streaming options.  I plan on purchasing a second one and then kissing satellite/cable TV good-bye forever!
author: Lizzianne

review: Everything I expected and a little bit more. Easy connectivity.Movable from room to room with ease. I suggest using the HDMI extension.
author: Jasper A. Miller

review: I am able to watch Netflix movies on my dumb television while exercising.  Love the Fire Stick.  Easy to install.  Met all my expectations.  Bought one for my husband too.
author: Millie "Millie"

review: Fire Stick has so many components to it that it is hard to rate it at this time when I am just getting to know all the things that it can do. There is no doubt it is very clever and play ten of thousands of songs and many other thngs.  So far, so good.
author: Ernest Pasquale

review: It works fine, I use it almost every day, but I hate that you have to run a power cord to it. The advertising makes it look like you just plug it in, AND MY PLAN WAS TO MOVE IT BETWEEN TV'S. You cant easily do that.
author: Tommy C
